resources.string: How can my organization donate food through ResQFood?
What types of food can my organization donate?
Is there a minimum quantity of food required for donation?
How does ResQFood ensure food safety?

To donate food through ResQFood as an organization, follow these steps: 
 1. Register or log in to your ResQFood organization account. 
 2. Navigate to the "Donate Food" section. 
 3. Fill out the donation form with details such as food type, quantity, and pickup location. 
 4. Submit your donation request.
Your organization can donate any perishable or non-perishable food items that are safe for consumption. This includes surplus food from events, restaurants, cafeterias, etc.
There is no minimum quantity requirement for food donations from organizations. Every donation, no matter how small or large, helps feed someone in need.
ResQFood partners with registered food banks and NGOs to ensure that all donated food items meet safety standards. Additionally, our volunteers undergo training in food handling and safety.
